modName: Silverlight Armor for DIMONIZED UNP Body
summary: Silverlight Armor made to fit DIMONIZED UNP Body.
descriptionHtml:
Description
=========
This is a conversion of the original Silverlight Armor for CBBE body by Jojjo made to fit the UNP (standard) body. This mod contains only the converted meshes and therefore requires installation of the CBBE version of the Silverlight Armor mod. 

Requirements
===========
DIMONIZED UNP female body Mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709)
Warglaives and Silverlight Armor 099 CBBE Mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10251)

Install
=======
Install the two mods mentioned in the Requirements section. Be sure to enable the Silverlight Armor.esp plugin which was installed as part of the Warglaives and Silverlight Armor 099 CBBE Mod. Extract the archive from my mod. Take the \"meshes\" folder and paste it into your Skyrim/Data folder. Respond \"Yes to all\" when asked to over-write. Be sure to install either the normal version or the chainmail version, but not both. If you install one of texture replacers be sure to install after one of the main files.

Uninstall
=========
Uncheck Silverlight Armor in Skyrim Launcher Data Files.
Delete:
- Silverlight Armor.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\Silverlight folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\Silverlight folder

Change Log
===========

1.5.
- Added UNP Skinny Body versions of all of the meshes.

1.4.
- Fixed alternative texture files which were incorrectly packaged.

1.3.
- Added some simple re-colours. 

1.2.
- Fixed minor clipping problem in gauntlets at high weight slider setting.

1.1. 
- Added Chainmail and No Pauldrons versions.

1.0.
- Initial upload.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Jojjo for the original CBBE version of this armorSilverlight Armor (UNP version)
Initial Upload Date: 2012-03-06
Category: Armor (Conversion)
Author: Falridorian

Description
=========
This is a conversion of the original Silverlight Armor for CBBE body by Jojjo made to fit the UNP (standard) body. This mod contains only the converted meshes and therefore requires installation of the CBBE Silverlight Armor (CBBE version) mod. 

Requirements
===========
DIMONIZED UNP female body Mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709)
Warglaives and Silverlight Armor 099 CBBE Mod (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10251)

Install
=======
Install the two mods mentioned in the Requirements section. Be sure to enable the Silverlight Armor.esp plugin which was installed as part of the Warglaives and Silverlight Armor 099 CBBE Mod. Extract the archive from my mod. Take the \"meshes\" folder and paste it into your Skyrim/Data folder. Respond \"Yes to all\" when asked to over-write.

Uninstall
=========
Uncheck Silverlight Armor in Skyrim Launcher Data Files.
Delete:
- Silverlight Armor.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\Silverlight folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\Silverlight folder

Credits
=======
Thanks to Jojjo for the original CBBE version of this armor and for his permission to post this conversion!
Thanks to Bethesda for the fantastic world of Skyrim.

Tools Used
==========
Blender
NIFSkope!
Thanks to Bethesda for the fantastic world of Skyrim.

Tools Used
==========
Blender
NIFSkope
author: Falridorian
